products.name: Bagel Bites Pizza Snacks! Three Cheese - 9 ct

extendedInfo.detail: Mini bagels with mozzarella, cheddar, monterey jack cheeses and tomato sauce.  Per 4 Mini Bagels: 180 calories; 3 g sat fat (14% DV); 360 mg sodium (16% DV); 3 g total sugars. 6 g of protein per serving.  Made with real cheese. Real. Quality since 1952. Great taste your kids will love! No high fructose corn syrup.  No artificial flavors. We welcome your comments. Please call 1-800-892-2401 Monday - Friday, and have the package with you when you call.  Please recycle this carton.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Bagel Halves (Enriched Flour Wheat Flour, Enzyme, Ascorbic Acid, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Water, Salt, Invert Cane Syrup, Yeast, Soybean Oil) Topping (Cheese Blend [(Cheese [Mozzarella Cheese (Cultured Milk, Salt, Enzymes), Modified Food Starch, Nonfat Milk, Whey Protein Concentrate]), Cheddar Cheese (Cultured Milk, Salt, Enzymes, Annatto Color), Monterey Jack Cheese (Cultured Milk, Salt, Enzymes)]) Sauce (Water, Tomato Paste, Invert Cane Syrup, Modified Corn Starch, Salt, Methylcellulose, Citric Acid, Potassium Chloride, Ammonium Chloride, Spice, Yeast Extract, Natural Flavor, Calcium Lactate), Invert Cane Syrup, Water.
extendedInfo.directions: Cook thoroughly. 2:30 min. Microwave 1100 watts: (For softer bagels) remove crisping tray from the box and remove plastic wrapper. Place tray shiny side up, with all 9 frozen bagel bites in microwave oven. Cook 2 minutes and 30 seconds on high power. Let bagels stand for 1 minute before serving. Here's how to make 'em: For best quality and food safety, follow these cooking instructions: Keep frozen until ready to use cook thoroughly before eating. Use caution as product and packaging will be hot! Appliance temperatures may vary. Please consider the performance of your appliance when following these instructions. Cook until 165 degrees F: Follow cooking instructions to ensure product reaches 165 degrees F, as measured by a food thermometer. Oven: Do not use crisping tray! Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. Arrange 9 frozen bagel bites about 1/2 inch apart on a baking sheet or shallow pan. Place baking sheet or pan on the upper middle rack in oven. Bake 12 minutes. Let bagels stand for 1 minute before serving. Toaster Oven: Do not use crisping tray! Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Arrange 9 frozen bagel bites on toaster oven tray and place in toaster oven. Bake 14 minutes. Let bagels stand for 1 minute before serving.  Keep frozen.
